definitions.definition: The formation of pits on a surface.
The formation, in a fluid , of vapor bubbles that rapidly collapse , especially in a rotating marine propeller or pump impeller .
The formation of cavities in an organ, especially in lung tissue as a result of tuberculosis .

main_definition: The formation of pits on a surface.
secondary_definitions: ( fluid dynamics ) The formation, in a fluid , of vapor bubbles that rapidly collapse , especially in a rotating marine propeller or pump impeller .
( biology ) The formation of cavities in an organ, especially in lung tissue as a result of tuberculosis .
